properties.Non-point sources of pollution: Addition of non-decomposable but recyclable wastes (E.g.: soap/shampoo containers) Near Orukandawela Well
properties.Recommended water quality improvement me:
Providing trash bins to collect categorized wastes.
Awareness program on how to dispose these waste containers properly and potential methods for recycling the containers

properties.Non-point sources of pollution: Improper disposal of household waste into a torrent
properties.Point sources of pollution:
Preparing a separate place in home gardens for disposing household waste
Awareness program on how to disposal household waste properly and converting them to usable products such as compost
Facilitating garbage collection
